verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3240>left<s%>, to <S%H5254>prove<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by <S%H3045>them<s%>, even as many of Israel as had not known all the <S%H4421>wars<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>;

Only <S%H7535>that<s%> the <S%H1755>generations<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> might <S%H3045>know<s%>, to <S%H3925>teach<s%> them <S%H4421>war<s%>, at the least such as <S%H6440>before<s%> knew nothing <S%H3045>there<s%>;

<S%H2568>Namely<s%>, five <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and all the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and the <S%H6722>Sidonians<s%>, and the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%> that <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, from <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H1179>Baal<s%>–hermon unto the entering <S%H935>in<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>.

And they were to <S%H5254>prove<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by <S%H3045>them<s%>, to know whether they would <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>, and <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, and <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>:

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to be their <S%H802>wives<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to their <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H7911>forgot<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1168>Baalim<s%> and the <S%H842>groves<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H2734>hot<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and he <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3573>Chushan<s%>–rishathaim <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H763>Mesopotamia<s%>: and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H3573>Chushan<s%>–rishathaim <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> raised <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H3467>deliverer<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who <S%H3467>delivered<s%> <S%H6274>them<s%>, even Othniel the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz<s%>, <S%H3612>Caleb<s%>'s <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%>.

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came upon <S%H8199>him<s%>, and he judged <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%>: and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H3573>Chushan<s%>–rishathaim <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H763>Mesopotamia<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5810>prevailed<s%> against <S%H3573>Chushan<s%>–rishathaim.
And the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>. And <S%H6274>Othniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, because they had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And he <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto him the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> and <S%H6002>Amalek<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of palm <S%H8558>trees<s%>.
So the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

But when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> raised them <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H3467>deliverer<s%>, <S%H164>Ehud<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1617>Gera<s%>, a <S%H1145>Benjamite<s%>, a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H334>lefthanded<s%>: and by <S%H3027>him<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H4503>present<s%> unto <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>.

But <S%H164>Ehud<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> him a <S%H2719>dagger<s%> which had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6366>edges<s%>, of a <S%H1574>cubit<s%> <S%H753>length<s%>; and he did <S%H2296>wear<s%> it under his <S%H4055>clothes<s%> upon his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3409>thigh<s%>.
And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> the <S%H4503>present<s%> unto <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>: and <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> was a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.
And when he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H4503>present<s%>, he sent <S%H7971>away<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H4503>present<s%>.

But he himself turned <S%H7725>again<s%> from the <S%H6456>quarries<s%> that were by <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, I have a <S%H5643>secret<s%> <S%H1697>errand<s%> unto <S%H4428>you<s%>, O king: who <S%H559>said<s%>, Keep <S%H2013>silence<s%>. And all that <S%H5975>stood<s%> by him went out from <S%H3318>him<s%>.

And <S%H164>Ehud<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H3427>him<s%>; and he was sitting in a <S%H4747>summer<s%> <S%H5944>parlour<s%>, which he had for himself <S%H164>alone<s%>. And Ehud <S%H559>said<s%>, I have a <S%H1697>message<s%> from <S%H430>God<s%> unto <S%H6965>you<s%>. And he arose out of his <S%H3678>seat<s%>.

And <S%H164>Ehud<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2719>dagger<s%> from his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3409>thigh<s%>, and <S%H8628>thrust<s%> it into his <S%H990>belly<s%>:

And the <S%H5325>haft<s%> also went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3851>blade<s%>; and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H5462>closed<s%> <S%H1157>upon<s%> the <S%H3851>blade<s%>, so that he could not <S%H8025>draw<s%> the <S%H2719>dagger<s%> out of his <S%H990>belly<s%>; and the <S%H6574>dirt<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%>.
Then <S%H164>Ehud<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> through the <S%H4528>porch<s%>, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H5944>parlour<s%> upon <S%H5274>him<s%>, and locked them.

When he was gone <S%H3318>out<s%>, his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>; and when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1817>that<s%>, behold, the doors of the <S%H5944>parlour<s%> were <S%H5274>locked<s%>, they <S%H559>said<s%>, Surely he <S%H5526>covers<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> in his <S%H4747>summer<s%> <S%H2315>chamber<s%>.

And they <S%H2342>stayed<s%> until they were <S%H954>ashamed<s%>: <S%H6605>and<s%>, behold, he opened not the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H5944>parlour<s%>; therefore they <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H4668>key<s%>, and <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H113>them<s%>: and, behold, their lord was fallen <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
And <S%H164>Ehud<s%> <S%H4422>escaped<s%> while they <S%H4102>stayed<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>beyond<s%> the <S%H6456>quarries<s%>, and <S%H4422>escaped<s%> unto <S%H8167>Seirath<s%>.

And it came to <S%H935>pass<s%>, when he was come, that he <S%H8628>blew<s%> a <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> with him from the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and he before <S%H6440>them<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7291>them<s%>, Follow <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>: for the Lord has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%>. And they went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3920>him<s%>, and took the <S%H4569>fords<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and <S%H5414>allowed<s%> not a <S%H376>man<s%> to pass <S%H5674>over<s%>.

And they <S%H5221>killed<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> about <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>, all <S%H8082>lusty<s%>, and all <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>; and there <S%H4422>escaped<s%> not a <S%H376>man<s%>.

So <S%H4124>Moab<s%> was <S%H3665>subdued<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. And the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And <S%H310>after<s%> him was <S%H8044>Shamgar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6067>Anath<s%>, which <S%H5221>killed<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> with an <S%H1241>ox<s%> <S%H4451>goad<s%>: and he also <S%H3467>delivered<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
